abstract: BBVA Compass, the American franchise of the Spanish bank, and the NBA will unveil a campaign on Friday to promote online consumer checking and savings accounts.
snippet: BBVA Compass, the American franchise of the Spanish bank, and the NBA will unveil a campaign on Friday to promote online consumer checking and savings accounts.
lead_paragraph: 9:29 a.m. | Updated BBVA, the official bank of the National Basketball Association, will announce on Friday that it is extending its services from the league to its fans.

headline.main: Campaign Promotes New Bank Service for N.B.A. Fans
